Top tables

Source: R/topTables-methods.R
topTables.Rd

Top tables of differentially expressed genes.

topTables(object, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqResults
topTables(object, n = 50L, coding = FALSE)

# S4 method for list
topTables(object, n = 50L, coding = FALSE)

Arguments

object

DESeqResults or list. For list method, must use resultsTables() return.
n

scalar integer. Number genes to report.
coding

boolean. Whether to only return coding genes.
...

Additional arguments.

Value

kable.

Examples

# DESeqResults ====
# Minimal return
topTables(res_small, n = 5L)
#> 
#> 
#> |geneID             | baseMean|lfc  |padj      |
#> |:------------------|--------:|:----|:---------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000024164 |    12562|8.27 |3.89e-194 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000029304 |    69340|5.36 |9.03e-76  |
#> |ENSMUSG00000003617 |     3560|4.08 |7.16e-45  |
#> |ENSMUSG00000022037 |     3544|3.56 |3.87e-42  |
#> |ENSMUSG00000040405 |     3002|3.74 |1.63e-37  |
#> 
#> 
#> |geneID             | baseMean|lfc   |padj     |
#> |:------------------|--------:|:-----|:--------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000027199 |    11624|-2.31 |9.65e-13 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000005980 |     5795|-2.72 |1.10e-12 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000049152 |    13888|-1.72 |6.78e-11 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000028713 |    14806|-1.65 |1.90e-10 |
#> |ENSMUSG00000061906 |     7413|-1.98 |7.50e-10 |

# `resultsTables()` return list ====
# Return with gene annotations and DESeq2 normalized counts
res_tbl <- resultsTables(
    results = res_small,
    counts = dds_small
)
#> 
#> 
#> ## treatment folic acid vs control
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> ### Summary statistics
#> 
#> 
#> - 500 genes in counts matrix
#> - Base mean > 0: 500 genes (non-zero)
#> - Base mean > 1: 500 genes
#> - Alpha: 0.1
#> - LFC threshold: 0
#> - DEG pass alpha: 254 genes
#> - DEG LFC up: 115 genes
#> - DEG LFC down: 139 genes
#> 
topTables(res_tbl, n = 5L)
#> 
#> 
#> |geneID             |geneBiotype    |geneName | baseMean|lfc  |padj      |description                           |
#> |:------------------|:--------------|:--------|--------:|:----|:---------|:-------------------------------------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000024164 |protein_coding |C3       |    12562|8.27 |3.89e-194 |complement component 3                |
#> |ENSMUSG00000029304 |protein_coding |Spp1     |    69340|5.36 |9.03e-76  |secreted phosphoprotein 1             |
#> |ENSMUSG00000003617 |protein_coding |Cp       |     3560|4.08 |7.16e-45  |ceruloplasmin                         |
#> |ENSMUSG00000022037 |protein_coding |Clu      |     3544|3.56 |3.87e-42  |clusterin                             |
#> |ENSMUSG00000040405 |protein_coding |Havcr1   |     3002|3.74 |1.63e-37  |hepatitis A virus cellular receptor 1 |
#> 
#> 
#> |geneID             |geneBiotype    |geneName | baseMean|lfc   |padj     |description                                                        |
#> |:------------------|:--------------|:--------|--------:|:-----|:--------|:------------------------------------------------------------------|
#> |ENSMUSG00000027199 |protein_coding |Gatm     |    11624|-2.31 |9.65e-13 |glycine amidinotransferase (L-arginine:glycine amidinotransferase) |
#> |ENSMUSG00000005980 |protein_coding |Dnase1   |     5795|-2.72 |1.10e-12 |deoxyribonuclease I                                                |
#> |ENSMUSG00000049152 |protein_coding |Ugt3a2   |    13888|-1.72 |6.78e-11 |UDP glycosyltransferases 3 family, polypeptide A2                  |
#> |ENSMUSG00000028713 |protein_coding |Cyp4b1   |    14806|-1.65 |1.90e-10 |cytochrome P450, family 4, subfamily b, polypeptide 1              |
#> |ENSMUSG00000061906 |protein_coding |Ugt2b38  |     7413|-1.98 |7.50e-10 |UDP glucuronosyltransferase 2 family, polypeptide B38              |
